hero.headline:
Count your tokens.
Like beads on an abacus.
hero.description: — monitor budgets, optimize context, and cut AI costs before they add up. Calculator, optimizer, and VS Code extension in one place.

whySection.title: Why count tokens?
whySection.subtitle: Because context is money and you're burning it.

extensionFeatures.title: VS Code Extension
extensionFeatures.description: Real-time context window monitoring inside your editor. Track token budgets, score tab relevance, and manage context through chat commands.

items.name: Token Budget Dashboard
items.description: Sidebar panel showing real-time token usage and per-file breakdown

items.name: Tab Relevance Scoring
items.description: Ranks open tabs by imports, path similarity, edit recency, and diagnostics

items.name: Context Rot Warnings
items.description: Alerts when conversation turns exceed threshold

items.name: Cost Calculator
items.description: Token cost calculator with Cobb-Douglas quality modeling

items.name: Context Optimizer
items.description: Visualize your context budget and optimize token usage

contextEngineering.title: Context Engineering
contextEngineering.description: A collection of agents, prompts, and instructions for maximizing AI coding assistant effectiveness through better context management.

items.name: Context Map Prompt
items.description: Generates a map of affected files

items.name: What Context Needed
items.description: Asks the AI what files it needs

items.name: Refactor Plan Prompt
items.description: Creates phased refactor plans with verification

howToUse.title: How you use it
steps: Open any project in VS Code
Open the sidebar to see real-time token budgets
Use @tokens in Copilot Chat for inline commands
Switch to the web tools for deep analysis
Optimize your context and cut costs
